titleStmt.title: By the King and Queen, a proclamation requiring all seamen and mariners to render themselves to Their Majesties service
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
Mary II, Queen of England, 1662-1694.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb deceas'd ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the twenty eighth day of January, 1691/2. In the third year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

person.persName: Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb deceas'd
